item.title: 48 companies you didn't know were using Rails in 2026
item.content:encoded: Rails is still alive and kicking in 2026, and a lot of companies trust it for their applications and backend infrastructure.

item.title: Claude Code skills: Automating FDA-required documentation for software as a medical device
item.content:encoded: Generating and maintaining FDA-required documentation for software as a medical device can be tedious and time-consuming. We built a Claude Code skill to automate documentation for 510(k) submissions.

item.title: The Bike Shed Ep 495: A shortcut to years of experience
item.content:encoded: Sally and Aji flick through thoughtbot’s guide to best practices in a bid to brush up on their coding habits.

item.title: Going beyond vibe coding with ReadySetGo
item.content:encoded: Introducing ReadySetGo. An AI application generator that creates first versions of products, built in Rails, to thoughtbot’s best practices. Not throwaway, vibe-coded prototypes. Real foundations that can be built upon.

item.title: Giant Robots Podcast Ep 603: The product we are going to build
item.content:encoded: Sami makes his triumphant return to the Giant Robots Smashing into other Giant Robots Podcast as he and his fellow hosts discuss a brand new tool currently in pre-production at thoughtbot.
